nodes.text: This forest was located in the equatorial regions of the Outer Rim world of Ryloth. It was inhabited by lyleks and gutkurrs, two of Ryloth's most dangerous predators.

During their mission to Ryloth, Darth Vader, Emperor Sheev Palpatine, and Imperial Royal Guards crashed a shuttle in this region and made their way to a Twi'lek village, fighting a swarm of lyleks along the way. The Free Ryloth Movement searched this area for survivors. Nordon, a Twi'lek pilot, died when his ship was telekinetically rammed into the ground by the Sith.
